name: Aref Ruqaa Ink
description: Aref Ruqaa Ink is an Arabic typeface that aspires to capture the essence of the classical Ruqaa calligraphic style. This font uses the COLRv1, CPAL and SVG tables. Please visit the gf-guide color page to learn more about Color Fonts technology. The Aref Ruqaa project is led by Khaled Hosny, a type designer based in Cairo, Egypt. To contribute, see github.com/alif-type/aref-ruqaa
author: Abdullah Aref, Khaled Hosny, Hermann Zapf
